channel.title: biking on Karun Ramakrishnan

item.title: Biking - Yerba Buena
item.description: Up until now a lot of people did not know that I bike. I never told anyone or wrote about it because I have this feeling that when I say something about things I do or things I like, I somehow stop doing it. I think it’s time to put that silly thought aside and talk about this sport that I love. So yes, I do bike. I got into this addictive sport about 6 years ago thanks to Cadence90 in Bangalore, India.
